title: Another European Country Plans to Add Bitcoin to Its Central Bank Reserves! Here Are the Details
body: The Czech National Bank (CNB) is considering adding Bitcoin (BTC) to its reserves as part of its diversification strategy. Czech Central Bank Discusses Adding Bitcoin to Reserves Central Bank Governor Ales Michl will present a proposal to the bank‚Äôs board of directors on Thursday, which, if approved, would allocate 5% of the central bank‚Äôs $146.13 billion reserves to the world‚Äôs largest cryptocurrency. ‚ÄúBitcoin looks good for diversification of our assets,‚Äù Michl said, noting that institutional interest in Bitcoin has increased, especially after BlackRock and other major asset managers launched spot Bitcoin exchange-traded funds (ETFs) last year. The move would make the Czech National Bank one of the first major central banks to include Bitcoin in its reserves, but the bank has yet to formally approve the plan and it remains unclear whether its board of directors will approve the proposal. If the Czech central bank continues investing, it would signal a significant shift in global monetary policy trends, as central banks traditionally hold reserves in fiat currencies, gold and government bonds. The decision could pave the way for other central banks to explore Bitcoin as part of their reserve strategies. *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: Another European Country Plans to Add Bitcoin to Its Central Bank Reserves! Here Are the Details

title: DeepSeek Accused of Stealing OpenAI Secrets
body: He compared this to theft. According to him, the Chinese company applied the outputs from OpenAI's models to train its own. ‚ÄùI don't think OpenAI is very happy about this,‚Äù Sacks stated. Microsoft and OpenAI have begun an investigation into this matter, media reports indicate. Microsoft security experts noticed in the fall of 2024 that individuals associated with DeepSeek were ‚Äùexfiltrating a large amount of data‚Äù using the OpenAI API. In the official documentation for the DeepSeek R1 model, the OpenAI package is utilized. DeepSeek's Success Over the weekend of January 25-26, the DeepSeek-R1 neural network caused a stir and led to sell-offs in stock and cryptocurrency markets. The company's chatbot surged in ranking among free apps on the App Store in the U.S., surpassing ChatGPT. The reason lies in offering top performance at significantly lower costs compared to American models. OpenAI CEO Sam Altman responded to the emergence of this competitor, calling the much-discussed DeepSeek-R1 ‚Äùimpressive.‚Äù He also promised to outdo the Chinese rival ‚ÄùClearly, we will provide much better models. Moreover, it's great to have a new competitor! We will roll out several releases,‚Äù he added. In a comment, Credentia CEO noted that DeepSeek could shake OpenAI's dominance in the AI sector. ‚ÄùThis has already happened. [...] But leaders in AI change about every month. One month it's Google, then Anthropic, then OpenAI, then LLaMA [Meta], and now DeepSeek. Their model today is not the best. It is unlikely to remain a leader. I am sure we will see much more competition and many more players. But nothing terrible has happened to American competitors so far,‚Äù he remarked. Gershuni also agreed that OpenAI could mount a worthy response to DeepSeek, as Altman promised. ‚ÄùYes, of course. We will see this happen many times again. Moreover, both companies will continue to attract attention repeatedly. This is just the beginning,‚Äù he noted. According to him, increased competition will lead to better products on the market. ‚Äù[...] In AI, there is also a political aspect, some global dominance at play. Whether it will be China, the USA, or a decentralized internet remains unknown [...],‚Äù he believes. Meanwhile, the U.S. Navy has already prohibited its personnel from using DeepSeek's AI technology due to ‚Äùpotential security and ethical issues,‚Äù CNBC learned. Currently, solutions from OpenAI and DeepSeek offer their own advantages and disadvantages, according to Gershuni. Among ChatGPT's strengths, he cited a more refined product that includes: Better application Advanced voice mode Operation of the AI agent ‚ÄùOperator‚Äù Online store GPT Store Among its drawbacks are a closed and paid system. DeepSeek, on the other hand, is free with open-source code. The model can be used locally on one's device without internet access. Impact on Stock Market The emergence of DeepSeek has raised questions about the viability of multi-billion dollar investments in graphics cards since its model offers comparable performance to top solutions without requiring many expensive chips. Consequently, Nvidia's stock fell by 17% during trading on January 27. Opinions arose online regarding a repeat of Cisco's history when its shares plummeted significantly after a substantial rise during the dot-com crash. Gershuni believes Nvidia will not face Cisco's fate. ‚Äù[...] There are no reasons for Nvidia's shares to crash seriously today. They might be worth several hundred billion less, but that doesn't impact anything. Nvidia remains an absolute leader, effectively a monopoly, and will likely stay that way for some time. I would rather buy Nvidia shares; however, this is certainly not financial advice,‚Äù he emphasized. After a double-digit decline, the chipmaker's value rebounded by 9% during trading on January 28. Niles Investment Management fund manager Dan Niles believes that the correction in shares is not yet complete. ‚ÄùI think investors should be very cautious in thinking this is the bottom,‚Äù he stressed. It should be noted that experts have called the excitement surrounding DeepSeek premature. Previously, the startup introduced a set of new multimodal AI models that it claims surpass OpenAI's DALL-E 3.

title: Nasdaq Drops Over 3% Intraday as Market Volatility Rises
body: The Nasdaq Composite extended its intraday losses to 3.39% , signaling heightened market volatility and investor uncertainty . Meanwhile, the S&P 500 fell 1.78% , and the Dow Jones Industrial Average dipped 0.11% , reflecting a broad market sell-off . What‚Äôs Driving the Nasdaq Sell-Off? Several factors contributed to the Nasdaq‚Äôs steep decline: Tech Stock Weakness ‚Äì High-growth technology stocks led the downturn as investors rotated into defensive assets . Macroeconomic Uncertainty ‚Äì Concerns over interest rates, inflation, and Federal Reserve policies weighed on sentiment. AI & Semiconductor Volatility ‚Äì Nvidia and other AI-related stocks faced profit-taking after recent rallies . The market‚Äôs risk-off sentiment triggered a sharp decline , with tech-heavy indices like the Nasdaq hit hardest . Market Reactions & Key Levels The broader U.S. stock market faced pressure across multiple indices: Nasdaq Composite: -3.39% intraday S&P 500: -1.78% Dow Jones: -0.11% Despite the Nasdaq‚Äôs steep decline, the Dow‚Äôs smaller drop suggests that investors are moving capital into defensive stocks while reducing exposure to high-risk tech assets . What‚Äôs Next for the Market? Earnings Season Volatility ‚Äì Tech earnings reports in the coming weeks could influence further market moves . Federal Reserve Policy Outlook ‚Äì Investors are closely watching the Fed‚Äôs upcoming meeting for interest rate guidance . Potential Rebound? ‚Äì If macro conditions stabilize, tech stocks could see a recovery after the sell-off . While short-term weakness persists , analysts will be watching for buying opportunities in beaten-down tech stocks . FAQs Why did the Nasdaq drop over 3% intraday? The decline was driven by tech stock sell-offs, macroeconomic concerns, and profit-taking in AI-related equities . How did other major indices perform? The S&P 500 dropped 1.78% , while the Dow fell only 0.11% , indicating a shift toward defensive stocks . Is this the start of a prolonged tech correction? While volatility remains high , much will depend on earnings reports and Federal Reserve policy decisions . Could the Nasdaq rebound soon? If macroeconomic conditions improve and investor sentiment stabilizes , tech stocks could see a recovery in the coming weeks . What should investors watch next? Upcoming tech earnings reports Federal Reserve‚Äôs next rate decision Market reactions to economic data Conclusion The Nasdaq‚Äôs 3.39% intraday drop highlights rising market volatility , with investors reacting to macroeconomic uncertainty and shifting risk appetite . As the market navigates upcoming earnings and Fed decisions , traders will be watching for potential rebounds or continued downside pressure in the tech sector. title: Bitcoin Whales Resume Accumulation: Is a Rally Imminent? (CryptoQuant)
body: The crypto market is recording a surge in bitcoin (BTC) inflows to whale wallets, indicating that this cohort of investors has begun to accumulate the digital asset again amid the recent downturn. Analysts at the market intelligence platform CryptoQuant see a substantial inflow of BTC into whale addresses as the act of storing BTC in custody wallets after over-the-counter (OTC) purchases. This means the whales that are currently accumulating are likely buying from OTC vendors because institutions prefer to purchase BTC through OTC trading. Bitcoin Whales Are Accumulating Whales‚Äô wallets are seeing inflows of more than 22,770 BTC. Considering the effect they have on the Bitcoin market, this period of accumulation could be bullish, and the cryptocurrency could experience a rally soon. The rise in OTC trades also signals a significant increase in inflows to the Coinbase Prime Brokerage Service because the platform is the preferred BTC purchase channel for institutions in the United States. This also suggests that the Bitcoin market is currently dominated by U.S. institutional investors, with such traders accounting for more than 50% of BTC spot trading market share. A separate CryptoQuant analysis from earlier this week revealed that U.S. entities, including banks, exchanges, and funds, are increasingly participating in this bull cycle. Their BTC holdings have continued to rise above the percentage of assets held by non-U.S. entities. Confidence in Bitcoin‚Äôs Future Amid the uptick in whale wallet inflows and U.S. institutional participation, the share of new such investors in the Bitcoin market has been rising. New whales refer to investors holding more than 1,000 BTC with coin ages of less than 155 days. These investors react more to market changes and are actively involved in trading, with their behavior reflecting the phase of the market cycle at any given time. Over the weekend, CryptoQuant analyst AxelAdlerJr disclosed that the share of new Bitcoin whales had reached 60% of the total realized capitalization of large players. Their growth began when BTC reached $55,000 last year, and since then, their share has risen 43% to its current level. Since the new whale activity tends to rise during periods of optimism, their current milestone signals confidence in Bitcoin‚Äôs potential and future market conditions. The post Bitcoin Whales Resume Accumulation: Is a Rally Imminent? (CryptoQuant) appeared first on CryptoPotato .

title: Sony Interactive Entertainment announces Hideaki Nishino as sole president and CEO
body: Hideaki Nishino will be promoted to Sony Interactive Entertainment‚Äôs sole president and CEO on April 1, 2025. He was previously appointed co-CEO of PlayStation alongside Hermen Hulst in June 2024. The company leadership announcement stated that Hermen Hulst will maintain his position as CEO of Studio Business Group and report to his new superior, Hideaki Nishino. Fans of the PlayStation community speculate that Concord is the reason behind Hulst stepping down as CEO. One user says , ‚ÄúHermen Hulst did everything to make Concord work; it was his baby,‚Äù and the game‚Äôs massive failure is the reason for his demotion. Hideaki Nishino has big plans for Sony Nishino revealed his plans for PlayStation. He also expressed his privilege to lead Sony Interactive Entertainment. He said, ‚ÄúTechnology and creativity are two of our biggest strengths as we continue to focus on developing experiences that deliver entertainment for everyone.‚Äù Nishino shared that the objectives are to grow SIE‚Äôs intellectual property portfolio and maintain technological innovation. He also thanked Hermen for his expertise and looks forward ‚Äúto what the future holds‚Äù with the support of PlayStation‚Äôs community. As part of his expanded responsibilities, Nishino remains CEO of the Platform Business Group. Meanwhile, Hulst will concentrate his efforts on supporting the creation and distribution of first-party games that operate under Sony Interactive Entertainment‚Äôs business framework. Sony Group Corporation also undergoes leadership changes The board will lose Hiroki Totoki as chairman of Sony Interactive Entertainment. He is presently the president of Sony Group, and he holds CFO and COO duties. Totoki will become Sony Group Corporation‚Äôs president and CEO and replace Kenichiro Yoshida. Yoshida will become both chairman and director going forward. Also, Sony Interactive Entertainment‚Äôs senior vice president of finance and corporate strategy, Lin Tao, will join Sony Group Corporation as CFO. Leadership announcements for her successor will be made in the future. Totoki looks forward to reaching ‚Äúnew heights in the days ahead.‚Äù He also said that SIE is experiencing an exciting new phase through which the team extends its commitment to creative development and community building. Yoshida made observations about the ongoing transition while focusing on the critical need for firm leadership within Sony in the future. He shared that, along with the board, he has gone through the succession plan for some months now. The contributions by Totoki in developing expansion strategies for both content and semiconductor sectors led them to nominate him as his successor‚Äôs role. NEAR Protocol: A Game-Changer for Decentralized Apps and Scalability NEAR Protocol is turning heads in the blockchain world. Founded by Alex Skidanov and Illia Polosukhin, it aims to make it easy for developers to create and launch decentralized applications (dApps). By using a technology called sharding, NEAR improves efficiency and scalability, allowing more transactions to happen at once. It‚Äôs like a decentralized version of centralized data storage systems, offering the benefits of both worlds. With over $20 million raised from major venture firms, NEAR has strong backing. Its key features include Nightshade, a unique sharding solution for better scalability; the Rainbow Bridge, which allows token transfers from Ethereum; and Aurora, a Layer 2 solution that leverages Ethereum‚Äôs technology for faster performance and lower fees. In today‚Äôs market, NEAR stands out with its focus on scalability and developer support. As demand for efficient and user-friendly dApps grows, NEAR‚Äôs technology could put it ahead of the competition. While other platforms like Ethereum face challenges with high fees and slower transactions, NEAR offers solutions that address these issues directly. With innovative features and a strong foundation, NEAR Protocol is positioning itself as a significant player in the next wave of blockchain development. It‚Äôs a project that‚Äôs catching attention and could be influential in shaping the future of decentralized applications. VeChain (VET): The Blockchain Revolutionizing Supply Chains VeChain is a blockchain platform that‚Äôs changing how we track and verify products. Founded by Sunny Lu, the former CIO of Louis Vuitton China, it focuses on bringing transparency to supply chains. By giving each product a unique ID and sensor, VeChain lets companies follow items from start to finish. This helps in industries like fashion, food, and cars, where knowing the authenticity and history of a product is vital. It means you can trust that handbag or know exactly where your food came from. What sets VeChain apart is its own blockchain, VeChainThor, and a dual-token system involving VET and VTHO. VET is used to move value across the network, while VTHO covers transaction fees. This setup makes transactions efficient and keeps costs low. With big-name partners like Walmart China and BMW, VeChain shows real-world use beyond just trading. Even though staking rewards are modest, there‚Äôs potential for passive income. In today‚Äôs market, where many coins lack practical applications, VeChain‚Äôs focus on solving real business problems makes it stand out as an attractive option. Ondo Finance: Bridging Traditional Finance and Blockchain for Everyone Ondo Finance is changing the game by blending the reliability of traditional finance with the efficiency of blockchain technology. It tokenizes stable, income-generating real-world assets, making high-grade financial products accessible to more people. By doing so, Ondo democratizes finance, using blockchain to enhance infrastructure and broaden accessibility. It has an asset management arm that creates tokenized financial products and a technology arm that develops DeFi protocols, which together enhance the functionality and scalability of its financial offerings. In the volatile cryptocurrency market, trust and security are paramount. Ondo addresses these challenges by collaborating with reputable partners like BlackRock and using Coinbase for crypto asset custody. It emphasizes quality and security, setting high standards for transparency and disclosure while striving for legal and regulatory compliance. One of its notable products, USDY, offers a unique blend of stablecoin accessibility and yield, secured by US Treasuries and bank demand deposits. This marks Ondo‚Äôs commitment to providing non-US investors with high-quality, regulated, and transparent financial products. In the current market cycle, where stability and trust are crucial, Ondo‚Äôs focus on real-world assets and regulatory compliance may appeal to those seeking less speculative options compared to other coins. Kaspa: The Lightning-Fast Cryptocurrency Shaking Up Blockchain Kaspa is a new kind of cryptocurrency that‚Äôs changing how blockchains work. Unlike traditional blockchains that discard extra blocks, Kaspa lets them exist together. This is possible because of its special GHOSTDAG protocol. Imagine multiple lanes of traffic merging smoothly without any cars being forced off the road. This method makes Kaspa incredibly fast, processing one block every second. The goal is to make it even quicker, aiming for 10 or even 100 blocks per second. This means transactions get confirmed almost instantly, limited only by internet speed. In today‚Äôs market, speed and efficiency matter more than ever. Kaspa stands out by solving the slowdowns common in other cryptocurrencies. Features like Reachability help track transactions easily, and block data pruning keeps the system running smoothly. Compared to other coins that take minutes to confirm a transaction, Kaspa‚Äôs near-instant confirmations are a big advantage. As the crypto world looks for faster and more scalable options, Kaspa‚Äôs innovative approach and ambitious goals make it a promising player to watch. Conclusion Neglecting NEAR, VET, ONDO, and KAS may limit financial growth, but XYZVerse ($XYZ) offers a unique opportunity with its ambitious goals and sports-meme fusion. title: Hong Kong Issues New Crypto Licenses, Boosting Investor Protection and Market Growth
body: The post Hong Kong Issues New Crypto Licenses, Boosting Investor Protection and Market Growth appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News Hong Kong‚Äôs Securities and Futures Commission (SFC) has issued its first two crypto trading platform licenses for 2025, bringing the total to seven since mid-2024. PantherTrade and YAX are the latest to receive approval under the Anti-Money Laundering and Counter-Terrorist Financing Ordinance (AMLO). The regulator has been actively reviewing crypto firms to ensure compliance with investor protection standards. With only Bitcoin, Ethereum, Avalanche, and Chainlink legally tradable in Hong Kong, the city continues enforcing strict regulations while fostering crypto market growth.

title: Bitwise Joins Memecoin ETF Race with Dogecoin Filing
body: According to reports, Bitwise has filed an S-1 with the SEC to launch a Dogecoin ETF, aiming to offer direct exposure to DOGE. Bitwise Seeks Regulatory Approval for DOGE ETF Crypto asset manager Bitwise has submitted a filing with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) to launch a Dogecoin (DOGE) exchange-traded fund (ETF). The filing, an S-1 document dated January 28, signals Bitwise‚Äôs intent to offer a product that directly holds DOGE and tracks its price movements. Bloomberg ETF analyst James Seyffart first reported the development. Filing Details and Custodial Arrangements For the approval process to move forward, Bitwise must also submit a 19b-4 filing, which is necessary for the SEC‚Äôs review. The proposed ETF lists Coinbase Custody as the custodian, a common choice among crypto ETF issuers. However, Bitwise has not disclosed details such as the fund‚Äôs ticker symbol, fee structure, or the stock exchange where it would be listed if approved. Growing Trend of Memecoin ETF Applications Bitwise‚Äôs move follows a prior registration in Delaware, reinforcing its commitment to bringing a Dogecoin ETF to market. This filing comes amid a growing number of memecoin ETF applications in the U.S., with firms such as Osprey Funds, REX Shares, and Tuttle Capital proposing funds tied to various meme tokens, including DOGE and Official Trump (TRUMP). Differences in Filing Approach Unlike some other memecoin ETF filings, which were made under the Investment Company Act of 1940 (40 Act), Bitwise‚Äôs filing falls under the Securities Act of 1933 (33 Act). According to Bloomberg Intelligence senior ETF analyst Eric Balchunas, this distinction is significant. The 40 Act imposes stricter investor protections, including limitations on leverage and short-selling, while the 33 Act is typically used for commodity-based ETFs. Market Reaction Dogecoin, initially created as a joke, has evolved into a widely recognized digital asset with a market capitalization of $47 billion, making it the eighth-largest cryptocurrency. The coin has gained traction due to social media influence and endorsements from figures such as Elon Musk. Despite growing institutional interest, Dogecoin‚Äôs price dropped 4% following the news, indicating investor caution. Regulatory Landscape The regulatory landscape for memecoin ETFs remains uncertain, especially given the SEC‚Äôs past reluctance to approve crypto-based investment products. However, changing political dynamics, including former President Donald Trump‚Äôs pro-crypto stance, have led some to speculate that regulatory approval for memecoin ETFs could become more feasible. title: Top Analyst Blames Ripple CEO, Claims XRP Is Not Suitable For US! Here's Why‚Ä¶
body: While reserve studies continue in the US, there is a lot of talk about including XRP in the national reserve, in addition to Bitcoin (BTC). At this point, Ripple CEO Brad Garlinghouse emphasized that if a government-backed digital asset reserve is to be created, it should reflect the entire crypto ecosystem through diversification rather than supporting a single token such as Bitcoin or XRP. Another famous name also stated that XRP has more advantages compared to Bitcoin and said that XRP should definitely be included in the US national digital asset reserve. Related News: Ripple CEO Reveals US National Reserve Ideas and Portfolio! Does He Have Bitcoin and Ethereum? Interesting XRP Release from Willy Woo! While XRP has emerged as the strongest reserve asset after Bitcoin, famous analyst Willy Woo claimed that XRP is not suitable for a strategic reserve, especially in the US. Woo went a step further and accused the Ripple CEO of undermining the national reserve debate. Comparing XRP to Bitcoin, Woo argued that Bitcoin is a geopolitically neutral asset, similar to gold, and is a more suitable asset for reserves. According to Woo, Bitcoin‚Äôs decentralized nature ensures its applicability in global reserves, a feature that XRP lacks. Woo, in an effort to emphasize that he was right in his claims about XRP, asked, ‚ÄúWhich countries would trust US-controlled XRP in a strategic reserve?‚Äù Responding to the Ripple CEO's post, Willy Woo said: ‚ÄúDear CEO of XRP living in the US, if the strategic reserve needs to be run, can you tell me which countries will buy US-controlled XRP? BTC is a geopolitically neutral asset like Gold. You are making people believe that XRP is a strategic reserve asset.‚Äù Dear CEO of XRP, living in the US, tell me which countries would buy US-controlled XRP if the strategic reserve needed to be put to work. BTC is a geopolitically neutral asset like Gold. You‚Äôre gaslighting people into thinking XRP is a strategic reserve asset. ‚Äî Willy Woo (@woonomic) January 29, 2025 *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: Top Analyst Blames Ripple CEO, Claims XRP Is Not Suitable For US! Here's Why‚Ä¶

title: Paradigm Pledges $1.25 Million for Tornado Cash Co-Founder Roman Storm‚Äôs Legal Defense
body: The post Paradigm Pledges $1.25 Million for Tornado Cash Co-Founder Roman Storm‚Äôs Legal Defense appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News Paradigm has pledged $1.25 million to support Tornado Cash co-founder Roman Storm‚Äôs legal defense. Storm faces up to 45 years in prison on charges including money laundering and sanctions evasion, sparking concerns about developer liability. Paradigm‚Äôs Matt Huang warned that the case could set a dangerous precedent for open-source development. Meanwhile, a Texas court recently overturned sanctions against Tornado Cash, strengthening Storm‚Äôs defense. The crypto community, including Vitalik Buterin, has rallied behind him, arguing that prosecuting developers for code misuse threatens the future of decentralized finance and privacy-focused technologies.

title: DeepSeek Concerns Grow, But Bitcoin Keeps Holding The Fort‚ÄîdeVere CEO
body: Often considered as a safe-haven asset during economic crisis, Bitcoin has created a special niche in finance. Its distributed character, free from conventional financial restrictions, gives it a unique appeal. Its volatility, however, calls to question its dependability. While some consider the crypto as too unstable for actual safe-haven status, others see it as a buffer against market turbulence. The CEO‚Äôs Viewpoint Nigel Green, CEO of DeVere Group, is a strong advocate for Bitcoin‚Äôs role as a safe haven and highlights its distributed architecture and restricted supply as key components that make it secure and resilient in the face of financial instability. Green thinks that the capacity of the flagship coin to operate independently of corporations and the government adds to its allure. Chinese AI Rocks The Market The Chinese AI company DeepSeek , meanwhile, is causing a great deal of disruption in international markets. Their V3 and R1 models can effectively start an arms race in artificial intelligence by competing with their US counterparts while consuming fewer resources. Bitcoin is risk asset but its holding remarkably well compared to tech stock . The market sees stability for Bitcoin despite the chaos . Fantastic step for #Bitcoin #deVere https://t.co/o3Cq86FtfM ‚Äî Nigel Green (@nigeljgreen) January 27, 2025 Due to the significant impact this invention has had on the technological sector, the US stock market has seen losses of hundreds of billions of dollars. For instance, when DeepSeek was launched last week, chipmaker Nvidia lost a whopping $589 billion, a record one-day loss for any company on Wall Street. Green advised investors to maintain their composure. In a note, he made the case that BTC is independent of the success of any one business or country ‚Äî the rise of China‚Äôs DeepSeek included. ‚ÄúThis is not the time for panic; it‚Äôs a time for perspective,‚Äù he said. Bitcoin‚Äôs fundamentals, according to the CEO, remain as strong as ever. ‚ÄúHistory has shown us that such moments of volatility often create the most significant opportunities for forward-thinking investors.‚Äù A Shift In Global Tech Balance The emergence of DeepSeek transcends a mere corporate success narrative; it signifies a transformation in the global equilibrium of power over new technology. The competition between the US and China for supremacy has rendered markets increasingly precarious. Trade tensions and geopolitical conflicts among other global economic events often affect Bitcoin‚Äôs appeal as a safe refuge. The alpha coin piqued interest following Brexit and the trade conflict between the US and China. It is important to keep in mind, meanwhile, that Bitcoin‚Äôs performance is not always constant and volatility is still a major problem. Bitcoin Unfazed By Geopolitical, Tech Tensions: Green ‚ÄúUnlike tech stocks, Bitcoin isn‚Äôt beholden to the performance of any one company or nation,‚Äù he explained. Green pointed out that Bitcoin is decentralized, borderless and finite: ‚ÄúBitcoin is an asset uniquely positioned to thrive in a world increasingly shaped by geopolitical tensions and technological disruption.‚Äù Geopolitical tensions and economic rivalries will likely escalate, Green said. ‚ÄúBitcoin, by design, is insulated from these forces. It operates outside of national borders and policies, making it a safe harbour in turbulent times.‚Äù Featured image from Medium, chart from TradingView

title: Czech National Bank Governor proposes $7B Bitcoin Reserve
body: Czech National Bank (CNB) Governor Ale≈° Michl wants to convert billions of euros of the country‚Äôs reserves into Bitcoin. As reported by Financial Times , this would be the first time a Western monetary institution would do this. Governor Michl said he would present a plan to the board to invest in Bitcoin to diversify the Czech National Bank‚Äôs reserves at a meeting on Thursday. Should the board approve this, he said the Czech National Bank could eventually hold as much as 5% of its ‚Ç¨140B of reserves in Bitcoin. Michl noted that demand for BTC had surged in recent years after investment management firm BlackRock and other firms started offering Bitcoin exchange-traded funds last year. He also referenced US President Donald Trump‚Äôs commitments to deregulation and the increasing influence of cryptocurrency executives on his administration. Last week, Trump issued an executive order establishing a working group to assess the potential creation of a national digital asset reserve. Michl pushes for Bitcoin diversification, defying traditional central bank views Michl said Bitcoin looks like a good asset for diversifying the Czech ‚Äòs assets. He said that while people like Trump could possibly cause a speculative bubble in BTC, the trend would remain on the rise even without their support because more people are now regarding it as an alternative investment. In December, Federal Reserve Chair Jay Powell said the US central bank has no Bitcoin. Historically, central banks have kept their reserves in conservative assets like US Treasuries and other highly rated bonds. A few hold equities, but very few have publicly explored investments in cryptocurrency. Michl claims to have ‚Äúa completely different philosophy‚Äù regarding Bitcoin than his peers. He describes himself as venturing where nobody else has ventured, especially when it comes to other bankers. As a person who has run an investment fund, Michl sees himself as a typical investment banker, with a typical investment banker‚Äôs preference for profitability. Central banks debate crypto investments, with some cautioning against risks Among central bankers cautioning against the risks of investing in cryptocurrencies is Joachim Nagel, governor of the Bundesbank. This month, he compared Bitcoin to ‚Äúdigital tulips,‚Äù alluding to the 17th-century speculative bubble and subsequent collapse in tulip bulb prices. European Central Bank officials stated last year that ‚Äúthe fair value of Bitcoin is still zero‚Äù and argued that it is ‚Äúnot suitable as a means of payment or as an investment.‚Äù Former ECB official Beno√Æt C≈ìur√© has also called Bitcoin the ‚Äúevil spawn of the financial crisis.‚Äù El Salvador, however, has been a notable supporter of cryptocurrency, making Bitcoin legal tender in 2021. According to its National Bitcoin Office, the government currently holds 6,048 Bitcoins, valued at around $621 million. However, the Central American nation scaled back its crypto-related ambitions late last year as it sought to secure a funding agreement with the IMF. Additionally, some central banks are experimenting with digital currencies, partly in response to the growing influence of cryptocurrencies. Michl thinks more central banks may adopt his approach in the next five years, as several funds and commercial banks have changed their views to include crypto in their investment portfolios. The Czech National Bank plans to shift its equity portfolio toward US stocks According to the Czech National Bank, if the Czech central bank had held 5% of its foreign reserves in Bitcoin over the past decade, its annual returns would have increased by 3.5 percentage points. Still, the investment would have also seen twice the volatility. As Michl reported, any significant investment by a central bank in a Bitcoin ETF can move the coin‚Äôs price. He said 5% of their assets is a lot of money, even for the Bitcoin market. The central bank has ‚Ç¨140 billion in foreign exchange reserves, which comprise about 45% of the Czech Republic‚Äôs GDP. The Czech National Bank already stands out among central banks for having 22% of its portfolio in equities, with the aim of having half of this in US stocks over the next three years, from 30% currently. Michl said they are buying gradually and in very small steps because stock prices are at record highs. While the Czech Republic remains one of seven EU countries outside the Eurozone, President Petr Pavel reignited the debate on adopting the euro in his New Year‚Äôs address, suggesting that paying salaries in the European currency, similar to Germany, could foster future prosperity. However, Michl refused the notion, saying that there was not enough price convergence and public support to recommend giving up the Czech koruna any time soon. Michl pointed out that the president is a military man and he is an economist by training, given that Pavel was a NATO commander. He also argued that while adopting the euro is advantageous in the case of political instability, independence and the ability to control monetary policy are useful in the fight against inflation. Michl also indicated that it was ‚Äúvery likely‚Äù his bank would reduce interest rates by 25 basis points next week, bringing them down from 4%, continuing the rate-cutting cycle that started in December 2023. Shouldn‚Äôt moving your money be as easy, cheap and instant as sending a text message or a photo to a friend? Free your crypto with Kraken Pay Sending payments just became cross-border and multi-currency From the Americas to Asia, from DOGE to dollars, choose from 300+ fiat and cryptoassets to send to anyone, anywhere in the world for free. Simply choose the fiat or cryptocurrency in your account you want to send and Kraken will instantly send the payment to your recipient. The process takes seconds and is free. Better yet, if you only have Bitcoin but your friend only wants Swiss francs, Kraken will manage both the asset conversion and settlement transfer in one step. This means all you have to do is choose an asset from your account and then choose which asset your friend wants to receive. Text crypto to your friends Sending payments is as easy as sending a text using a paylink. A paylink is a simple and secure URL that can be sent¬†using any messaging service, like SMS and WhatsApp. The recipient simply clicks on the paylink to accept payment. If your friend or family member doesn‚Äôt have a Kraken account, you can still send them a broad range of fiat and cryptoassets using a paylink. All they need to do is set up a Kraken account after clicking on the paylink, and with a couple easy steps they can claim the funds. Claim your customizable @Kraktag today Moving cryptoassets across your social circle has not been easy, until today: Your Kraken Pay @Kraktag makes it so. A @Kraktag is a simple and secure unique identifier for Kraken Pay users. Use it to send and receive payments ‚Äî either in crypto or fiat currency. Your friends and family can simply enter your designated @Kraktag to send payments instead of needing to enter your full bank account details. No two @Kraktags are the same and you can customize your @Kraktag so that loved ones can find you in the Kraken App. Get Kraking and turn your crypto into payments today Kraken Pay is available for Kraken clients now! title: Crypto.com Moves to Delist USDT and 9 Other Tokens Under MiCA
body: The full removal of these tokens is set for March 31, 2025. Senator Elizabeth Warren also recently raised concerns over Commerce Secretary nominee Howard Lutnick‚Äôs ties to Tether, and questioned his ability to regulate the crypto industry impartially. Meanwhile, the EU sees a digital euro as a defense against the dominance of US dollar stablecoins, especially in response to Trump‚Äôs executive order encouraging USD-backed assets while banning central bank digital currencies (CBDCs) in the US. Crypto.com Announces USDT and Stablecoin Delistings Crypto.com became one of the first crypto exchanges to announce the delisting of Tether‚Äôs USDT and nine other tokens in Europe after the implementation of the Markets in Crypto-Assets Regulation (MiCA) framework. The exchange will suspend purchases of these assets on Jan. 31 to align with European regulatory requirements. Deposits will be disabled, while withdrawals for the affected tokens will be available until the end of the first quarter of 2025. The complete delisting is scheduled for March 31, after which any remaining holdings will be automatically converted to a MiCA-compliant stablecoin or another asset of corresponding market value. The delisting will impact a total of¬†ten cryptocurrencies, including Wrapped Bitcoin (WBTC), Dai (DAI), Pax Dollar (PAX), Pax Gold (PAXG), PayPal USD (PYUSD), Crypto.com Staked ETH (CDCETH), Crypto.com Staked SOL (CDCSOL), Liquid CRO (LCRO), and XSGD. The European Securities and Markets Authority (ESMA) urged European crypto asset service providers to restrict non-MiCA-compliant stablecoins by Jan. 31. The delisting of USDT in the European Union has been a serious topic since Coinbase first announced its decision to remove the stablecoin in October of 2024. Coinbase Europe later completed its delisting, and provided its users the option to convert their USDT holdings into MiCA-compliant alternatives like Circle‚Äôs USD Coin (USDC). Despite MiCA regulations coming into full effect on Dec. 30, multiple crypto asset service providers in the EU continued trading USDT. However, more exchanges are now taking steps to comply with regulations. (Source: ESMA ) Some crypto firms in Europe have successfully obtained MiCA licenses, while others, including Crypto.com, are in the process of securing one in Malta. According to Juan Ignacio Iba√±ez, a member of the Technical Committee of the MiCA Crypto Alliance, ESMA‚Äôs directive makes it very clear that by March 31, ‚Äúno trace of USDT should remain, not even in ‚Äòsell-only‚Äô mode.‚Äù Meanwhile, its closest competitor, USDC, already received MiCA approval in July 2024 and currently holds a market cap of $52 billion. Warren Raises Concerns Over Lutnick‚Äôs Tether Connections Tether is also in trouble with Senator Elizabeth Warren. She recently raised concerns over Howard Lutnick, President Donald Trump‚Äôs nominee for Commerce Secretary, because of his firm‚Äôs connections with stablecoin issuer Tether. In a letter dated Jan. 27, Warren shared that she is very alarmed over Lutnick‚Äôs involvement with Tether, and called it a ‚Äúknown facilitator of criminal activity‚Äù due to Cantor Fitzgerald‚Äôs role as both a stakeholder and asset manager for the company. While Lutnick agreed to divest his interest in Cantor Fitzgerald, Warren questioned whether his longstanding ties to the firm and its affiliates could compromise his ability to act in the best interest of the American people if confirmed. Warren believes that Lutnick‚Äôs position as Commerce Secretary will give him a lot of influence over policies that affect Tether and the broader cryptocurrency industry. She also specifically requested answers to thirteen questions about his financial stake in Tether, any discussions he may have had with Trump administration officials about the company, and whether Cantor Fitzgerald conducted due diligence to ensure Tether‚Äôs compliance with financial regulations like Know Your Customer rules, the Bank Secrecy Act, and anti-money laundering laws. She has set a deadline of Feb. 10 for Lutnick‚Äôs response. Warren has long been critical of the crypto sector, and argued that Tether is used for illicit activities, including money laundering, sanctions evasion, and even financing North Korea‚Äôs nuclear program. Despite these allegations, Tether actively cooperated with authorities in cracking down on criminal activity. On Jan. 27, the company worked with blockchain firms Tron and TRM Labs to help Spanish law enforcement freeze $26.4 million linked to a money laundering network. In September, Tether also collaborated with the FBI to recover $6 million that was stolen by crypto scammers targeting US citizens. Warren is very notorious for advocating for stricter regulation of the industry. She urged Trump‚Äôs Treasury nominee to consider imposing tougher laws and repeatedly introduced the Digital Asset Anti-Money Laundering Act to bring the crypto sector under existing financial crime frameworks. The legislation was introduced in both 2022 and 2023, but it faced strong opposition from crypto advocacy groups and national security officials. EU Sees Digital Euro as Defense Against US Stablecoins Meanwhile, President Donald Trump‚Äôs executive order on digital financial technology intensified concerns in the European Union over the dominance of the US dollar in the stablecoin market. European Central Bank executive board member Piero Cipollone addressed these concerns at the 13th ILF Conference on the Future of the Financial Sector in Frankfurt. According to Cipollone, the overwhelming reliance on US dollar-backed stablecoins is a key reason for the EU‚Äôs continued efforts to develop its own central bank digital currency (CBDC). During the panel, Cipollone pointed to Europe‚Äôs growing dependence on international card schemes, which process over 60% of card payments in the EU. He also mentioned the sharp increase in mobile app payments in the region, which rose from just 1% of transactions in 2019 to 9% in 2024. His biggest concern, however, was the dominance of US dollar stablecoins, which account for 97% of the global stablecoin market that is currently valued at $222 billion. He held firm that a digital euro is essential to ensure continued access to central bank money and to maintain European banks‚Äô role in the financial system. Stablecoin market (Source: CoinGecko ) The EU‚Äôs concerns were increased by the Trump administration‚Äôs clear stance on promoting the US dollar‚Äôs sovereignty. In an executive order on strengthening American leadership in digital finance, the administration pledged to support the development and growth of lawful and legitimate dollar-backed stablecoins worldwide. While the order openly encourages US dollar stablecoins, the order explicitly bans the establishment, issuance, and use of central bank digital currencies in the United States. This could create some problems for global CBDC initiatives. For the most part, Trump‚Äôs executive order is seen as a pro-crypto move, but some analysts argue that its ultimate goal is to reinforce the dominance of the US dollar on a global scale. Attorney David Lesperance suggested that while the order wants to position the US at the forefront of digital financial assets, it also signals that any technology threatening the US dollar‚Äôs reserve currency status will face strong opposition. He believes that Trump could use economic leverage, like tariffs, to pressure the EU and other economies into stopping their own CBDC development. Tensions could soon start to rise as¬†the EU pushes forward with the digital euro and the US strengthens its dollar-backed stablecoins.

title: Top Cryptocurrencies to Consider as the Market Begins to Rebound
body: Over the last two days, the crypto market has seen liquidations surpassing $1 billion, leaving many investors uncertain about their next steps. However, this could be an opportune moment to identify and invest in the top cryptocurrencies, as this recovery phase might offer significant profit potential. We've curated a list of trending projects, both well-known and new to the scene, to highlight some of the best altcoin opportunities poised for substantial gains in the coming weeks or months. Top Cryptocurrencies to Consider Now For investors of all types, exploring a diverse range of cryptocurrencies from different categories can be a wise strategy to balance risk while still having the chance for high returns. This selection includes a strategic mix of meme coins, utility tokens, and niche categories‚Äîsome already well-established, others still in presale stages. MIND of Pepe MIND of Pepe is capturing attention from both AI enthusiasts and meme coin investors, merging autonomous trading technology with the speculative nature of cryptocurrency. Its key innovation is an AI agent that scans social media for trends, executes trades, and launches new tokens using real-time data. This setup gives MIND holders exclusive early access to AI-generated token launches and curated market insights, offering a distinct edge in the unpredictable crypto market. Additionally, its staking system offers an impressive APY for early adopters, making it an attractive option for earning passive income while holding MIND. The presale of its native token, MIND, has gained considerable attention, being featured in leading crypto publications, with some experts forecasting it as a high-multiplier investment . Its Pepe-themed concept is driving positive social media sentiment, sparked by discussions about its AI trading capabilities and its place in the larger AI narrative captivating the market. As investors search for the next big AI crypto, MIND of Pepe stands out as a compelling choice. Aptos Aptos made its debut with significant momentum, launching one of the most talked-about airdrops in recent times. Designed as a Layer-1 blockchain, Aptos addresses scalability and efficiency issues within the industry, using its Move programming language to boost security and transaction speed. Unlike other networks that face congestion, Aptos employs a parallel execution engine, enabling multiple transactions to be processed simultaneously without slowing down. This makes it appealing for DeFi, NFTs, and gaming projects seeking a smooth user experience. Aptos has steadily grown into a strong competitor against leading projects, surpassing networks like Sui and Base in engagement and activity despite their higher market caps. Currently valued around $7.5, many analysts believe it's undervalued, especially considering its growing developer network. As the market strengthens, Aptos could see increased demand, benefiting from rising adoption and investor interest. With a robust technological base and a history of growth, it remains a solid option for those interested in blockchain infrastructure investments. Meme Index Meme Index is tapping into the growing desire for structured exposure to the meme coin market. Rather than relying on single-coin speculation, it offers a diversified approach with various index categories suited to different risk levels. The project showcases four main indices: the Titan Index, Moonshot Index, Midcap Index, and Frenzy Index. The Meme Titan Index tracks established tokens like DOGE, SHIB, and PEPE, offering a relatively stable entry into the meme space. The Meme Moonshot Index targets newer projects with strong momentum, ideal for those seeking high-risk, high-reward scenarios. The Meme Midcap Index includes tokens that have seen substantial growth but still have room for further expansion, while the Meme Frenzy Index is designed for high-volatility, degen-level meme coins with explosive potential. https://twitter.com/memecoin_index/status/1883854850355806552 Having raised over $3 million in presales, this project has garnered strong investor confidence. Beyond its indexed investment approach, Meme Index offers a staking program with a competitive APY, making it attractive for those looking to maximize returns while engaging with the meme coin sector. As memecoins remain popular, this project provides a structured route to participate in the market while reducing some of the risks linked to individual token speculation. Solana Solana has firmly established itself as a major player in the crypto world, with a market cap exceeding $110 billion. Renowned for its ability to process high transaction volumes at low costs, it has become the preferred blockchain for diverse applications, such as DeFi, gaming, and NFTs. Its efficiency has led to the launch of several trending projects within its ecosystem, reinforcing its position as a key player in the industry. While it may not carry the speculative appeal of lower-cap tokens, Solana remains a solid option for those looking to add a strong, established asset to their portfolio. The ongoing discussions about Solana potentially being considered for the US strategic reserve along with XRP have sparked interest in its long-term potential. Trading around $250, there is still potential for growth, with analysts expecting it to surpass $300 as demand rises. Considering its history and the projects it supports, Solana continues to be a cryptocurrency that investors watch closely, especially as market conditions improve. Solaxy Solaxy is positioning itself as an essential addition to the Solana network, serving as the first Layer-2 scaling solution built specifically to address congestion and optimize performance. By processing transactions off-chain before finalizing them on Solana‚Äôs mainnet, it significantly improves speed and reduces transaction costs for developers and users alike. With Solana‚Äôs growing adoption, a project like Solaxy could prove to be a game-changer, ensuring that the ecosystem remains efficient even as demand surges. The project has already gained significant traction, raising over $15 million in its presale. Investors see its potential as a necessary component for the long-term scalability of Solana. With Solaxy offering a staking mechanism with an impressive APY too, it makes for an attractive opportunity for those looking to earn passive income while supporting the ecosystem‚Äôs expansion. With its unique positioning and increasing relevance within the Solana network, Solaxy could become one of the more impactful projects to emerge in the current cycle. Ondo Finance Ondo has quickly gained recognition as one of the most promising projects within the cryptocurrency market, despite being a relatively new name among large-cap tokens. Focused on bridging traditional finance with decentralized systems, it provides tokenized exposure to real-world assets, particularly US Treasury securities. This initiative brings institutional-grade investment opportunities to the blockchain, making Ondo a significant player in the rapidly growing real-world asset (RWA) sector. A recent development that has fueled even more interest in the project is its partnership with Ripple Labs , which will see tokenized US Treasuries introduced to the XRP Ledger. Despite its growing recognition, its current market cap of approximately $4.5 billion suggests that it may still have substantial room for growth. Wall Street Pepe Wall Street Pepe has dominated discussions in the crypto space, becoming one of the most successful presales of the year. Combining elements of meme culture with a finance-centric theme, the project has drawn traders looking for high-risk, high-reward opportunities. Unlike standard meme coins, Wall Street Pepe introduces trading-related features that could make it more than just another speculative asset. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MGyVXpxixM0 The project‚Äôs branding, featuring a sharp-dressed banker version of Pepe, has further contributed to its growing appeal. Community engagement remains strong, with YouTubers like ClayBro labeling it as one of the top presales to watch. Given the recent performance of meme coins and the project's widespread recognition, Wall Street Pepe is positioned as one of the more anticipated releases in the space, with the potential for rapid gains once trading begins. Catslap Catslap embraces the unpredictability of meme coins, creating an ecosystem centered around humor, community engagement, and high-risk speculation. Its addictive slap-to-earn mechanic has attracted attention across social media, with investors speculating on its potential to deliver massive gains. If recent meme coin trends are anything to go by, Catslap‚Äôs early success could translate into strong post-launch price action, making it one to watch in the current market. Best Wallet Token The Best Wallet ecosystem continues to expand, drawing in a growing number of users looking for a seamless Web3 experience. With an emphasis on security, multi-chain compatibility, and user-friendly design, the platform has established itself as a preferred option for managing digital assets. The launch of its native token, BEST , has further strengthened its position, attracting investors interested in both utility and long-term value appreciation. The presale has been a massive success, raising over $8.5 million, highlighting the confidence investors have in the project. The token‚Äôs pricing currently sits at $0.02355, with many anticipating further demand as the platform continues to develop. Best Wallet has also built a substantial following, both through its growing user base and its expanding social media presence. With its strong foundation and various utilities, BEST remains a project that many are keeping on their radar, particularly as more users look for reliable and efficient Web3 solutions. Conclusion The sheer number of projects in the space right now makes it difficult to find the best crypto to buy now. With the current volatile market situation, it is important to stay invested only in projects that actually have a scope for growth. All the projects mentioned above tick off major boxes to consider while selecting a crypto investment. As long as investors consider the risks and allocate funds that they could risk losing, investing in such projects could be a great idea, whether it‚Äôs more established names like Solana and Aptos or newer options like MIND of Pepe and Meme Index.

title: Crypto Accounting Platform Cryptio Raises $15M in Series A Extension
body: Crypto accounting platform Cryptio has raised $15 million in an extension to its Series A funding round from June 2022 . Existing investor Alven led the round and featured participation from new backers 1kx and Ledger Cathay Capital, Cryptio told CoinDesk via email on Wednesday. The $15 million raised takes the total for the Series A round to $25 million. Cryptio's aim is to provide traditional financial (TradFi) entities with back-office operations and infrastructure that allow them to offer digital asset products such as stablecoins, crypto-backed loans and crypto savings. Many observers are expecting the number of banks offering crypto services to increase following the repeal of the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commision (SEC)'s controversial SAB 121 accounting rule. SAB121 decreed that a company keeping a customer's crypto should record them on its own balance sheet, potentially having major implications for banks' capital allocations when working with crypto clients. This drew ire from crypto industry participants as it did not account for the lack of guidance from the SEC on how securities laws apply to digital assets. The repeal of this legislation is therefore being hailed as sign of the changing regulatory landscape for cryptocurrency in the U.S. Read More: A New (Digital) Age at the SEC

title: Digital Currency Group Spins Off Crypto Mining Subsidiary Fortitude From Foundry
body: Digital Currency Group (DCG) is spinning off the self-mining unit of its Foundry subsidiary into a separate business called Fortitude Mining that will mine crypto across a range of digital assets, the company said Wednesday. What makes Fortitude Mining different is that it will not only mine bitcoin ( BTC ), but other proof-of-work protocols as well, with a focus on high-return tokens. Andrea Childs, previously employed as the senior vice president of operations and marketing at Foundry, has been appointed CEO of Fortitude Mining. Mike Colyer remains the CEO of Foundry, which provides digital asset infrastructure to the crypto ecosystem. "Spinning out Fortitude Mining provides greater growth opportunities to further scale the business, including raising capital, making additional investments, and attracting top-tier talent," said Barry Silbert, founder and CEO of DCG, in a statement. DCG is looking for strategic partners such as venture capital firms, to invest in Fortitude, Childs said in an interview with CoinDesk, and has received potential interest in the mining firm's equity and debt. Fortitude plans to reinvest cash flows into new hardware and site acquisitions in 2025. Its current mining fleet is highly efficient, Childs said.

title: Somnia and Uprising Labs Partner to Launch Gaming Accelerator for Web3 Innovation
body: New York, USA, January 29th, 2025, Chainwire Somnia , a blockchain platform focused on bringing global data on-chain through high-performance infrastructure, has announced a strategic partnership with Uprising Labs, a Web3 game publisher. Together, they are launching a six-month gaming accelerator program aimed at supporting developers and contributing to the growth of the decentralized gaming ecosystem. The partnership between Somnia and Uprising Labs is founded on a shared commitment to developing immersive and scalable gaming experiences powered by blockchain technology. Uprising Labs, recognized for its "fun first" approach, specializes in supporting mid-to-hardcore PC and console games, assisting both indie and AAA developers in integrating Web3 elements. Accelerator: Backed by $10M in Funding Backed by a $10M grant from Somnia Blockchain and led by Uprising Labs, this accelerator equips game studios with the tools, guidance, and resources needed to thrive. Key Features of the Accelerator: Mentorship and Development: Uprising will mentor game developers, providing support and guidance to transform ideas into polished Web3 games. Funding and Deck Review: Assisting developers in enhancing their proposals and securing investment. On-demand Classes: Covering key disciplines from game development, on-chain integration, web3 go-to-market, and more. Ecosystem Expansion: The program aims to grow the Somnia ecosystem by introducing innovative games that highlight the scalability and performance of the blockchain. Additionally, the partnership introduces Club, making the Web3 gaming industry more accessible and empowering participants with tailored resources. The initiative fosters connections among gaming enthusiasts, expands networking opportunities, and offers early access to select projects, industry insights, and developments in Web3 gaming. The club serves as a gateway for developers looking for hands-on experience and players interested in exploring emerging trends in Web3 gaming, fostering both innovation and community engagement. Uprising Labs: A Full-Stack Web3 Publisher Uprising Labs brings a comprehensive approach to game publishing, focusing on: Elevating Web3 Games: Improving gameplay and growing communities for established¬†blockchain titles. Incubating New Projects: Supporting emerging developers to bring engaging new games to the market. Transitioning Web2 Games: Helping established Web2 games in integrating blockchain technology to unlock new revenue streams and enhance player engagement. Additionally, Uprising implements a unified token ecosystem across its portfolio, creating interconnected gaming economies designed to provide value for both developers and players. Somnia‚Äôs Infrastructure for Web3 Gaming Somnia provides key blockchain infrastructure to support Web3 gaming, including: 400k TPS and Sub-Second Finality: Facilitating real-time interactions for high player volumes. Sub-Cent Fees: Reducing transaction costs for developers and players. Reactive Blockchain Technology: Enabling fully on-chain games to respond dynamically to live events and data. ‚ÄúPartnering with Uprising Labs is an exciting step forward for Somnia‚Äôs mission to bring mass-consumer gaming fully on-chain,‚Äù said Paul Thomas, founder of Somnia. ‚ÄúTheir expertise in gaming, combined with our blockchain‚Äôs capabilities, will empower developers to build scalable, immersive games that resonate with players worldwide.‚Äù Users can learn more on the Somnia gaming page. About Somnia Somnia is the fastest and most cost-efficient EVM Layer 1 blockchain, designed to support real-time, fully on-chain applications. Its cutting-edge technology delivers unparalleled speed, scalability, and cost efficiency, making it the ideal platform for Web3 games, social platforms, and immersive virtual experiences. About Uprising Labs Uprising Labs is a Web3 game publisher dedicated to delivering engaging and immersive gaming experiences in the blockchain space. Focused on mid-to-hardcore games for PC and console, Uprising Labs collaborates with Indie to AAA game developers to help them transition seamlessly into Web3. title: XRP Is The Best Looking Altcoin Chart Right Now, Says Crypto Analyst
body: Renowned trader and market commentator Jacob Canfield (@JacobCanfield) has identified XRP as the standout performer among altcoins, sharing a price chart on X that underscores the token‚Äôs recent momentum. While most altcoins have suffered double-digit losses in recent days, the XRP price has held up exceptionally well. XRP Builds Strong Momentum The daily chart for the XRP/USD perpetual contract on ByBit reveals a steady climb from sub-$0.50 levels in early November to a current consolidation area around $3.10. The overall picture shows a series of higher highs and higher lows, affirming XRP‚Äôs ongoing bullish structure. The initial rally began below $0.50, gathering momentum through November and early December. By late December, XRP had reached the $2.00 region, briefly consolidating before continuing its move upward. Around mid-January, the token surpassed $3.00, topping out near $3.20 before experiencing a pullback. Related Reading: XRP Rebound Gains Traction As Bulls Aim To Sustain The Momentum Canfield‚Äôs chart highlights several key support and resistance levels, including a pink demand zone around $1.90‚Äì$2.00 that has repeatedly acted as a strong base whenever price has dipped. A sharp wick into this zone, followed by a swift recovery, suggests that bulls are consistently defending the $2.00 threshold. Higher on the chart is a black horizontal line near $2.90, which marked the local top in early December 2024 and is now serving as support. XRP‚Äôs historical support levels‚Äîmarked at $0.5478, $0.3125, and $0.1778‚Äîsit far below current market prices but provide context for significant regions observed in past trading cycles. Recent candlestick patterns reflect notable volatility around $3.00. A sudden drop briefly took the market under $2.65, but the price rebounded almost as quickly. This type of sharp dip and recovery often implies sufficient liquidity and a willingness among traders to absorb sell orders. The cluster of candlesticks near $3.05‚Äì$3.10 indicates a balance between buying and selling pressure at a pivotal resistance zone; a decisive move up or down may set the tone for near-term momentum. Related Reading: Bollinger Bands Tighten On XRP Daily Chart ‚Äì Major Price Move Ahead? In his brief yet emphatic comment‚Äî‚ÄúXRP ‚Äì Unironically looks like the best altcoin chart in crypto right now‚Äù‚ÄîCanfield expresses a bullish view based on the chart‚Äôs clear structure and resilient demand. He points to the strength of the uptrend, well-defined support and resistance levels, and what appears to be robust interest in defending key zones. Although he has not offered explicit price targets, the chart reveals the importance of holding above $3.00 which aligns with the pivotal 0.5 Fibonacci retracement level (drawn from the mid-January peak) and potentially breaking past $3.24 (0.786 Fibonacci retracement level). In a worst case scenario, a deeper correction could revisit the $2.00 demand zone, where XRP has found considerable support in recent months. Whether XRP can sustain its position and build upon its market traction remains to be seen, but its technical framework has attracted the attention of many traders looking for altcoins with strong trend dynamics. Featured image created with DALL.E, chart from TradingView.com

title: Market-Shattering DeepSeek AI Predicts Bitcoin (BTC) and XRP Prices for 2025!
body: Ripple (XRP), which continues to solidify its place as the world's third-largest cryptocurrency, surpassed $3 for the first time since 2018 in recent weeks. While it is wondered whether the XRP price, which is trying to hold above $ 3, will break new records, China-based artificial intelligence model DeepSeek predicted the price of XRP. What Will Be the XRP Price in 2025? DeepSeek AI noted that it took into account Ripple‚Äôs legal status, its battle with the SEC, adoption rates of its On-Demand Liquidity (ODL) platform, and overall market trends when predicting the future price of XRP. According to DeepSeek AI, XRP could trade in the $3.50 to $5.00 range by the end of 2025. A positive outcome in Ripple‚Äôs legal process with the SEC could boost investor confidence and accelerate institutional adoption. DeepSeek AI puts the probability of Ripple seeing a positive outcome at 70 percent. 2025 Prediction for Bitcoin! China's new artificial intelligence model DeepSeek AI also shared its Bitcoin (BTC) prediction for 2025, apart from XRP. Accordingly, DeepSeek AI, which has attracted attention in recent days, has identified three different scenarios for Bitcoin for 2025: ‚ÄúBase Case: Bitcoin is expected to trade between $100K and $150K. Optimistic Scenario: The price is estimated to reach $350,000. Black Swan Scenario: It is stated that Bitcoin could reach the $500,000 level, but this scenario is less likely than the others. The rise of DeepSeek, which has taken the markets by storm in recent days, has shaken the balances in global markets. According to the data, DeepSeek has surpassed ChatGPT as the most downloaded application in the US, while US technology stocks have suffered a major decline in the face of this development. *This is not investment advice.
